description: Enhance your coding experience with Islamic reminders, Quran recitation, prayer times, and spiritual content integrated within VS Code
config.codeTune.enableReminders: Enable Islamic reminders and wisdom notifications
config.codeTune.reminderInterval: Interval between Islamic reminders in minutes
config.codeTune.showWisdom: Show Islamic wisdom and verses in reminders
config.codeTune.showMorningAzkar: Show Morning Azkar during appropriate times (أذكار الصباح)
config.codeTune.showEveningAzkar: Show Evening Azkar during appropriate times (أذكار المساء)
config.codeTune.workingHoursOnly: Only show reminders during working hours (9 AM - 6 PM)
config.codeTune.language: Choose the display language for CodeTune
views.codeTuneMain.name: CodeTune
viewsContainers.codeTune.title: CodeTune
commands.codeTune.playQuran.title: Play Quran
commands.codeTune.stop.title: Stop
commands.codeTune.openSettings.title: Open Settings
views.islamicDhikrCounters.name: Islamic Dhikr & Counters
views.quranTime.name: Quran Time
